ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.utils

Class CameraUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.utils.CameraUtilities

  • public final class CameraUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for the Camera Activity, contains utility methods for the camera-preview and compass

      • aspectRatio

        public static int aspectRatio(int width,
                              int height)
        Calculate the aspect ratio of the display in function of the width and height of the screen
        Parameters:
        width - width of the preview in Pixels
        height - height of the preview in Pixels
        Returns:
        Aspect ratio of the phone

      • getFieldOfView

        public static androidx.core.util.Pair<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Float> getFieldOfView(android.content.Context context)
                                                                               throws android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException
        Get the horizontal and vertical field of view of the back-facing amera
        Returns:
        null if there is no camera, else the horizontal and vertical field of view in degrees
        Throws:
        android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException

      • combineBitmaps

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap combineBitmaps(android.graphics.Bitmap base,
                                                     android.graphics.Bitmap overlay)
        Combines two bitmaps into one
        Parameters:
        base - first bitmap
        overlay - second bitmap that is drawn on first bitmap
        Returns:
        A bitmap that combine the two bitmaps
